196 48.name: Fort Victory
196 48.description:
Fort Victory stands proudly here, a tall stone tower surrounded by a wooden palisade.
It overlooks the scene of a recent victory against the alien Predators.
People of all races congregate here, whether seeking refuge or glory.
Here, you may replenish your supplies, buy weapons, and rest until your next venture.
To the north, a barren road leads to the Victory Forward Camp, where new heroes do battle
against the fledgling Goblin stronghold built by the remains of the defeated Goblins.
To the south, a well-patrolled road leads to the bustling Redoubt City.

196 47.name: Victory Road
196 47.description:
This barren road is littered with the remnants of the defeated Goblin army.
Goblin stragglers roam about in a daze, easy pickings for even the most inexperienced heroes.

196 46.name: Victory Road
196 46.description:
This barren road is littered with the remnants of the defeated Goblin army.
Goblin stragglers roam about in a daze, easy pickings for even the most inexperienced heroes.

196 45.name: Victory Forward Camp
196 45.description:
Victory Forward Camp is a bustling encampment full of bright-eyed new heroes,
ready to begin their quest to rid the world of the evil Predators.
You can buy supplies and ammunition here, but not much else.
If you wish to sell your loot, you should go south to Fort Victory.

195 44.name: Victory Plains
195 44.description:
This is the site of a great victory over the Goblin Army.
Unfortunately, the Goblins have regrouped and are starting to re-establish a foothold in this area.
New heroes are pouring forth from Fort Victory and the Victory Forward Camp to the south,
to put an end to this Goblin menace.

196 44.name: Victory Tundra
196 44.description:
This is the site of a great victory over the Goblin Army.
Unfortunately, the Goblins have regrouped and are starting to re-establish a foothold in this area.
New heroes are pouring forth from Fort Victory and the Victory Forward Camp to the south,
to put an end to this Goblin menace.

197 44.name: Victory Forest
197 44.description:
This is the site of a great victory over the Goblin Army.
Unfortunately, the Goblins have regrouped and are starting to re-establish a foothold in this area.
New heroes are pouring forth from Fort Victory and the Victory Forward Camp to the south,
to put an end to this Goblin menace.

196 43.name: Goblin Path
196 43.description:
This is a crude path, created by the trampling of many Goblins.
Their tracks appear to come from and go to the north.

196 42.name: Goblin Stronghold
196 42.description:
At last, you have discovered the source of the evil Goblin infestation.
A crude wooden-walled bailey, the Goblin Stronghold is home to a fledgling force of Goblins,
who are plotting to retake the north. There must be a chieftain here leading the Goblin forces.
You should slay this chieftain: if not for advancing the war effort,
you should do it for the shiny loot the chieftain is bound to carry.
